title: Songs of Life, Love and Lust
description: Set against the backdrop of Southern California, Phil Caruso takes readers on a journey through surreal stories and playful yet palpable poetry. They inhabit a wild world of words about life, sex, love, and death over a soundtrack of musical madness. His writing forces the mind to explore more than just meaning, a place where dreams drum the beating heart's imagination of infinity.
author: Phil Caruso
